haskell-game

haskell-game

 

Modules

  • Bindings Holds all the bindings for the GLUT callbacks
  • BuildWorld Builds the world
  • Camera The Camera object.
  • Cube Creates GLUT cubes.
  • Display Holds the display function called by GLUT every frame.
  • GameObject The representation of a object used by the game
  • Main My Haskell Video Game! I still have no idea what its going to be!
  • Points Contains an array of n points in a circle.
  • World The game world.
